about_the_game:
He's very sad. I think we can all relate.

Play as him through your Squares Rage levels to try and get him to stop crying.

Purchasing this DLC unlocks the associated character in the parent game, Squares Rage.
detailed_description:

Play as him through your Squares Rage levels to try and get him to stop crying.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/XP(?) (Don't use XP... who still uses that?!)
  • Processor: Pretty much any processor will do.
  • Graphics: Nothing fancy. Be able to at least handle pixel-art/8-bit style graphics.
  • Sound Card: Pretty much any.

short_description: Play as him through your Squares Rage levels to try and get him to stop crying.
